segments.text: I can ’ t believe Obama is our President .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am proud to know that he is our President .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you vote for him , because I know that I did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have nothing but faith in Obama .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure he will help better America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do need some change in this country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our country is already changing as it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I trust that he will take good care of our country .
segments.speaker: S2
